ComicInfo.Summary:
One Fine Day On Main Street: A 18 year kid can't buy liquor at the store, so he robs it.
A MAD Look At Hoarders: Extreme hoarding and how being on TV changes the hoarders.
Things You Don't Want to Hear From a Marriage Counselor: Statements that show you have a horrible counselor.
Sheen It?: Parody of the game Scene It?, using questions about Charlie Sheen.
Dancing with the Star Wars: Parody of TV show "Dancing With The Stars", using Star Wars Characters.
Don Martin Beats The High Cost Of Gasoline: Some improbable list of ways to travel without gasoline are demonstrated.
Spy vs. Spy: In the first story, the Black Spy becomes paranoid of the White Spy after reading Wikileaks, but fails to discover the plot against him. In the second story, the White Spy succumbs to a window rigged by the Black Spy.
MAD's 11 Little-Known, Practical, Real Life Uses for Ballet: Demonstrating how ballet moves can get you out of many a jam.
MAD's Thor-oughly Stupid Thor Outtakes: Stills from the movie "Thor" with fake dialog.
Signs That Your Hypochondria Is Out Of Control: Examples of extreme hypochondria.
The Strip Club: A collection of comic strips.
Muddled Family: Parody of TV show Modern Family.
MAD Libyan: parody of Mad Libs puzzle books
The Fundalini Pages: Various short satires of pop culture.
